name: WaterTheOdds
0:
”Alexa, ask Water The Odds”
”Alexa, open Water The Odds”
”Alexa, launch Water The Odds”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: water the odds
des:
Water The Odds - This skill will give you certainty for future events, it will give you the odds of something happening out of 10. The highest probability of something happening is of course 10 and the lowest on the scale is 1 meaning it is unlikely for that event to happen.

Simply say "Alexa, ask water the odds" and the skill will launch
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
